title: Open Redirect
vulnerability_information:
Open Redirect on  https://www.semrush.com/

User can be redirect to malicious site 
POC:  https://www.semrush.com/redirect?url=http://bing.com

I hope you know the impact of open redirect and more info refer

https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/601.html

## Impact

User can be redirect to malicious site.

activities.message: Thanks for the report, we will investigate this.

Hello Security Team,
This report was made for simple URl redirection.

However,in my case I was able to bypass and now,I can confirm it bypassing via several encoding.
First bypass
https://www.semrush.com/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F

Second method of bypass 
https://www.semrush.com/redirect?url=https://www%2Egoogle%2Ecom

Third method of Bypass(double Encoding previous method)
https://www.semrush.com/redirect?url=https://www%252Egoogle%252Ecom

Fourth method(Full encoding)
https://www.semrush.com/redirect?url=http://%77%77%77%2E%67%6F%6F%67%6C%65%2E%63%6F%6D

Now,even if you fixed this report,bypassing via url encoding will be there.

So, in my case I displayed you URL redirection along with bypass.

Please consider my issue too and fixed separately since it was bypass.

Thanks
Kunal

Hello Security Team
fix redirect url for this domain also www.potato.semrush.com/redirect?url=https://www.google.com
Thanks
Kunal
Thanks for making our service safer!
